http://www.cnn.com/2007/WORLD/asiapcf/02/04/bangladesh.praying.ap/index.html
 
 Islam is thought of these days by some as a violent religion; for others it fuels the erroneous idea that religion in general evil or violent. This article shows how there certainly are many Muslims who desire peace, and not war. I don't yet more evidence showing how religion itself isn't evil, but rather it is evil to misuse religion. I don't see how critics of religion who say it lends itself to violence can read things like this and still hold to their views.

Jyoshu, thanks for not bashing Muslims.
 
 Most Muslims are in favor of peace.
 
 I take issue with religion, however, specifically religions spend so much time attacking and denigrating other religions, which is the bloody cause of most of the wars on this planet.
 
 Besides the starvation, want, disease, etc., caused by the belief systems of these religions which also lead to war.
 
 Most people want peace. But they should critically examine their belief systems and determine how the blindnesses of those belief systems lead to conflict and wars.

Jyoshu, thanks for not bashing Muslims.

 
 Well of course! I wouldn't want to take the sort of tact you take toward religion! One only needs to read your thread titles to see how you really view religion.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  3 Million Muslims Praying for Peace
